Proof of address is required. Clients must present one of these items, dated within 45 days:  Utility bill (gas, electric, oil, water, sewer, cable, phone); Bank statement, credit card bill, or printed pay stub; Current letter from MassHealth or other state or federal agency; Current vehicle registration or insurance bill; or Driver\u2019s license.  All clients who arrive at the pantry and do not live in one of the towns listed above will be asked to complete a brief registration and will receive a one-time emergency bag of groceries.   This location is a Healthy Pantry participant.", "notes": "As of March 15, 2024, we are only accepting NEW clients from Medway until further notice.  The pantry does not open until 8 a.m.  Cars cannot line up before 7 a.m.  The pantry is in a residential area and this policy is strictly enforced.
